atlantic.title: Gun Control's Biggest Advocate: The Church?
atlantic.topComment: If a majority of killings by gun were of NRA members, gun enthusiasts, and 2nd Amendment activists I'd be more sympathetic to the anti-gun crowd. But, when we see that none of the gun laws proposed or imposed would have stopped any of these mass shoo...

atlantic.title: Guilty, Then Proven Innocent
atlantic.topComment: More power to them. Innocent people do not belong in jail. Sounds like they need more funding. And it might well be cheaper in the long run to fund them more generously.

atlantic.title: Stripping a Professor of Tenure Over a Blog Post
atlantic.topComment: In McAdams' case, there is a relevant history. Specifically, he has a history of using his blog to attack not only faculty but Marquette students -- in the past he has made posts that, by name, attack undergraduates for things they have said on campu...

atlantic.title: Kanye Should Have Taken the Mic From Beck at the Grammys
atlantic.topComment: First of all, where do West or Kornhaber get off implying that Beck isn't a serious artist? This isn't Milli Vanilli you're talking about here, this is an incredibly talented artist who's done more to enrich music as a whole than Beyonce has. Whether...
